```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
griffeydata <- read_csv(here("data/KenGriffyJr.csv"))
griffeydata <- griffeydata %>%
  clean_names()
```


Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Griffey OPS+

```{r}
x <- ggplot(griffeydata, aes(x = year, y = ops_2)) +
  geom_point()

ggplotly(x)
```

### Griffey Homeruns

```{r}
p <- ggplot(griffeydata, aes(x = tm, y = hr)) +
  geom_boxplot()

ggplotly(p)
```
